rows.text_1: Here’s how to **CONNECT** with your child using a quick and easy daily activity:
rows.section_1_text: This helps you to give your full attention to your child.
rows.section_1_extra_text: Giving your child your full attention helps your child to feel connected to you.
rows.section_2_text: Don’t try to change or control what your child is doing.
rows.section_2_extra_text: This helps your child feel important and in control.
rows.section_3_text: Pay attention to what your child is doing. Be curious about what they might be thinking and feeling. Talk about that.
rows.section_3_extra_text: This shows your child you are interested and helps your child feel connected to you.
